item.title: Report E-2023100437
item.description:
Report E-2023100437

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-16T18:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AIRCRAFT BELLY DUE TO AN ODOR. UPON INSPECTION DISCOVERED TWO JERRICANS LAYING ON THEIR SIDES LEAKING CONTENTS FROM THEIR CLOSURES. PRODUCT LABELS APPLIED TO THE CONTAINERS INDICATE FLAMMABLE PICTOGRAMS AND A FLASH POINT OF 118.9F. OTHER THAN THE PICTOGRAMS THERE ARE NO ADDITIONAL DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER CONTAINERS. ADDITIONAL LEAKING PACKAGE TRACKING NUMBER 1Z6430970143400719.

item.title: Report X-2023090928
item.description:
Report X-2023090928

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-17
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023090928 SequenceEvent: package was leaving the unload area when it was noticed that the bottom and side were wet. Package was then brought to the QA area for processing. Upon opening the package it was discovered that on of the bottle tops was loose and leaked a little bit damaging the inside of the box. The majority of the damage came from another leaking package (of the same product) in the same shipment. DescribePack: One of the bottle tops came loose during shipment and leaked. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the top was tightened down. 2. X-2023090931 SequenceEvent: package was discovered wet and damaged coming out of the trailer in the unload area and was brought to the QA area for processing. One of the bottles was missing it's top and was almost empty. This package damaged another hazmat package of the same contents. DescribePack: One of the bottle tops came off during shipment. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The bottle top was placed back on and tightened down

item.title: Report X-2023090906
item.description:
Report X-2023090906

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: CHANDLER
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was presumably damaged during transit to recipient, as customer refused package for being damaged. DescribePack: Package is entirely opened (torn) on one side due to liquid damage, with some walls inside soiled as well. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a tote and reported to QA, who immediately brought it over to the hazmat cage and placed it inside.

item.title: Report X-2023090882
item.description:
Report X-2023090882

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-18T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to the QA area wet on one side and the bottom inside due to two gallon bottles having loose tops and leaking. Once it was discovered, the package was opened and the lids of the bottles were tightened down. DescribePack: Two of the lids came loose in transit and leaked. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The tops were tightened down.

item.title: Report X-2023090867
item.description:
Report X-2023090867

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-18T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: PRESCOTT
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was discovered unloading trailer. Manager was notified. Line was stopped. Trailer was inspected. Hazmat was place in lined hazmat tote. Hazmat tote loaded in hazmat cage. DescribePack: 2 bottles of purple degreaser had loose caps leaking out of containers. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in hazmat tote. placed in hazmat cage immediately after.

item.title: Report X-2023070541
item.description:
Report X-2023070541

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-17T00:34:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-23
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Operations Supervisor advised a Gallon pail of UN1219, ISOPROPANOL, 3, PG II, was setting on the dock in front of door 13 when forklift ~driver drove by the area and accidentally struck the 1-gal pail causing a spill of UN1219, ISOPROPANOL, 3, PG II. The blade of the forklift ~punctured the pail cau sing all the product to spill out on the dock floor.
